advices.advice: Create time for relaxing activities and suitable hobbies such as painting, modeling, reading, and knitting
If you catch a cold, see a doctor
Relax at the swimming pool, move around a bit
Augment your diet with a proper intake of dairy
Make use of a support bandage, and it helps ease tension and back pain
Keep an updated list of things your newborn will need such as wet wipes, a thermometer, kidsâ€™ washing powder, and a syringe
Get creative with body art on your belly and take cute photos
